Text.val: 21.04.2011 JH SCR16392 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and GB002 by GB902
02.01.2009 GB SCR14273 Removed test BPIV_BTPC_LINENO <> BPIV_BTPC_LINENO
of the updated BPIV row and BPIV_INVOICENO = 999999
09.10.2007 SH SCR12972 Step2 Fixed problem with sort on BPIV
02.04.2007 SH SCR12419 Step2 Changed test BPIV_PAYMENTCODE = 0 to be now
-- Calc totals, used in GroupSuffix of BPIV_BTCP_LINENO

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRH) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRPAY) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/bpiv where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 and BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = :4 for fetch only
